experiences.title: Open Play - Dozens of Games
experiences.description: Dozens of games to choose from.  1 hour minimum.  3+ player bookings includes 1 free game of Free-Roam LA DeadZone (based upon availability).
experiences.refundPolicy: Reservations cancelled at least {hours} hours in advance will receive a full refund. Refunds will be credited back to the original credit card used for payment.
experiences.refundPolicyDisplay: Reservations cancelled at least 48 hours in advance will receive a full refund. Refunds will be credited back to the original credit card used for payment.
